# Hex Glyph, Greater (Spell)
## Overview
[[Abjuration Spells|Abjuration]]

**Level:** [[5th Level Shaman Spells|Shaman 5]], [[5th Level Witch Spells|Witch 5]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 10th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 10]], [[BoXM 10th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 10]]

**Casting Time:** 10 minutes

**Components:** V, S, M (powdered diamond worth 400 gp)

**Range:** Touch

**Target or Area:** Object touched or up to 5 sq. ft./level

**Duration:** Permanent until discharged (D)

**Saving Throw:** See text

**Spell Resistance:** No (object) and yes; see text

**Source:** Advanced Class Guide, pg. 184

This spell functions as *[[Hex Glyph (Spell)|hex glyph]]*, except you can store a hex or a major hex (but not a grand hex). You trace the glyph with incense, which must first be sprinkled with powdered diamond (as noted in the material line).

*[[Read Magic (Spell)|Read magic]]* allows its caster to identify a *greater hex glyph* with a DC 16 [[Spellcraft (Skill)|Spellcraft]] check.
